name: cssSweet
description: cssSweet is a suite of tools for processing CSS. It comes with several output modifiers to modify CSS values, and a plugin that concatenates and processes CSS from specified chunks to a minified CSS file. Version 2+ also concatenates and minifies JS.
author: @sepiariver YJ Tso

properties.name: threshold
properties.desc: Valid, 6-character hex against which to evaluate light and dark hex values.
